scripts.rebuild:ui: cd ./back && @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../front && @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../back
scripts.create:ui: cd ./front && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../back
scripts.delete:ui: cd ./front && @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../back && @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist
